Pre-Game Insights: Salvador Perez and the Kansas City Royals will take the field on Tuesday at Kauffman Stadium against Tanner Bibee, who is projected to start for the Cleveland Guardians.
The Guardians are listed as -134 moneyline favorites in this matchup against the Royals (+114).
Cleveland is the run-line favorite (-1.5). An 8-run over/under is set for the matchup.
